text: Maxim Mikhailovich Mikhailovsky (; born July 24, 1969) is a Russian former professional ice hockey goaltender. Mikhailovsky competed at the 1997 Men's World Ice Hockey Championships as a member of the Russia men's national ice hockey team. He played for HC CSKA Moscow. He was inducted into the Russian and Soviet Hockey Hall of Fame in 1993. ==Awards and honours== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! title: Maxim Mikhailovsky
